net.realmproject.dcm.event.publisher

Interface DeviceEventPublisher

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandsAccessor<T>, DeviceAccessor<T>, Pingable, StatefulDevice<T>, ValueDevice<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractValueDevice, ActiveMQWireMessageSink, Camera, Device, ICommandDevice, ICommandsAccessor, IDeviceAccessor, IDeviceEventPublisher, IPingDevice, IValueDevice, IWireMessageSink, JmsWireMessageSink, MjpegCamera, UrlCamera

    public interface DeviceEventPublisher
    A DeviceEventPublisher is anything which publishes events of its own.
    Author:
    NAS

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void publish(DeviceEvent event)
      Sends the given DeviceEvent.
      default void publish(DeviceEventType type, java.lang.String sourceId, java.io.Serializable value)
      Convenience method for publish(DeviceEvent).
      default void publish(DeviceEventType type, java.lang.String sourceId, java.lang.String targetId, java.io.Serializable value)
      Convenience method for publish(DeviceEvent).

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        void publish(DeviceEvent event)
        Sends the given DeviceEvent. If this component is not currently sending events (eg stopSending() has been called) this event will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to send

      • publish

        default void publish(DeviceEventType type,
                     java.lang.String sourceId,
                     java.io.Serializable value)
        Convenience method for publish(DeviceEvent). Builds a DeviceEvent from the given values and publishes it.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of DeviceEvent
        sourceId - the id of the originating node
        value - the payload for this event. To set no payload, pass null

      • publish

        default void publish(DeviceEventType type,
                     java.lang.String sourceId,
                     java.lang.String targetId,
                     java.io.Serializable value)
        Convenience method for publish(DeviceEvent). Builds a DeviceEvent from the given values and publishes it.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of DeviceEvent
        sourceId - the id of the originating node
        targetId - the id of the target node. To set no targetId, pass null
        value - the payload for this event. To set no payload, pass null
